column2: caramelized onions) This was not as I was expecting. It was more cheesy than it was creamy. Like really
column3: sooo much cheese. I'm not a big fan of blue cheese so that was probably part of my problem with it. It did come highly recommended
column4: just wasn't expecting this to be so heavy either. I was thinking the blue cheese was just going to be sprinkled on top
column5: but it was baked right in and acted as the cream....so more like cheesey spinach vs creamed spinach
